text:
Hello All,
I want to build a workflow with a custom code.
I want the custom code to clone a deal from 1 pipeline to another and copy some of the deal properties into the new deal.

Would appreciate some help if anybody tried a similar scenario

You donâ€™t need to use custom code for it.
You can use create record task and in use the properties from 1st deal to new deals

<@UFBNA9K9A> I am getting inconsistent results. The following 3 pages all have language variations. It works on 2 and not on 1. Any ideas?

WORKS <https://www.babelbot.app/fr/help/getting-started> (go to the bottom of the page)
